title: Waymo recalls robotaxi software after school bus safety failures
description:
In its investigation, the NHTSA said a Waymo AV in Atlanta failed to remain stopped when approaching a school bus.

The post Waymo recalls robotaxi software after school bus safety failures appeared first on The Robot Report.
